review: The Fire Stick is quick and easy to use. Has everything I need for my kids.  The only improvement would be allowing the device to piggyback off of the power from the TV rather than plugging it in.  Otherwise I love it..
author: Doc

review: Great lil brother to the fire tv. Out does its competitor by far, packs a big punch for its size. I have to say I was pleased with its performance and from here I can only see great things to come from the Fire TV family.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Honestly, i was skeptic about this. I had heard some bad things about fire TV and of course everyone knows the fire phone. But! We got our fire stick last night, plugged it into our TV and got it running smoothly. It has a great youtube application so that i can watch Lets plays from the Achievement hunters, Of course it has netflix, and since im a prime member i got the prime library plus all the tv shows and movies ive bought in the past. Whats not to love about this? Even better since it was announced i got it for 20 bucks with my prime membership!!! I finally have something i can play on my TV without alot of connections and crap. it runs smoothly, easy to navigate. + i can turn my kindles and phone into a remote!!!! I downloaded the fire TV stick application and its as simple as pressing a button to connect to it!!!to be quite honest this is a great product and i highly recommend it to anyone!
author: Arsenio M.
